With only a short walk to the train station, schools and shops close by this 3 bedroom home is sure to appeal to most buyers.
Currently tenanted on a month x month basis at $325 per week, the home has polished boards and split system heating and cooling to the lounge, ceramic tiled to wet areas and wall oven and gas cooktop to the kitchen meals area.

Call Frank Barrett for all enquires on this home.

Description:
**SOLD BY PAUL RINGERI**
RANGEBANK ESTATE, CRANBOURNE: Loved and cared for over the years this spacious property has a distinct country feel with its extensive use of brick and timber making it feel cosy and inviting all year round.
Presented in beautiful condition throughout 74 Marylyn Place is fronted by picturesque gardens with manicured hedges and a facade boasting classic colonial bay windows. A secure roller door shields the tandem carport with an expansive concreted area following plus an additional rear set garage/workshop complete with wood heater. Measuring app. 8.3m X 4m this is a tradie's dream and would be the perfect place for the man cave!
Step inside to find a deceptively large and fully functional floorplan. Complete with a generous sunken lounge with feature stone fireplace and a separate meals zone which adjoins the oversized Blackwood timber hostess kitchen offering updated stainless steel appliances. Don't forget the open plan family area and the sensational bonus of having a huge rumpus room towards the back of the property. This is an ideal multi-purpose area suited to those with a pool table, movie buffs with a home theatre system and families needing large accommodation for the teenagers or a home based business!
There are 3 robed bedrooms including the master with a walk-in wardrobe and a modernised slate tiled ensuite with double shower that complements the renovated family bathroom with stylish freestanding bath. Don't forget the 3 toilets plus the added comfort of zoned ducted heating, a Coonara wood heater, 2 split system air-conditioners and multiple ceiling fans.
Step outside to find a vast covered entertaining area and an old school backyard with a massive mature palm tree and gated access to the parkland at the rear. There is additional storage space using the oversized garden shed (measuring app. 5m X 3.8m). Take advantage of the large land size of app. 719m2 with plenty of room for the kids and pets to play, whilst there is also ample parking space for low clearing work and recreation vehicles!
If you believe in the age old theory that a top location equals great real estate then this is an absolute must to inspect! Sensational position within walking distance to Rangebank Primary School and Kindergarten with Lawson Pool Recreation Reserve literally down the road. Close proximity to buses, Merinda Park train station and Thompson Road, which provides direct access to all of the shopping facilities on offer at the Cranbourne Home Maker Centre!
With turnover in this popular estate at an all-time low don't muck around or else you will miss out!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW (PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS)!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
Ideal first home or investment
This family home is what you have been searching for. In a good location close to schools, shops, buses and Cranbourne train station. Featuring:
- Four large bedrooms, the master with a built-in robe, full ensuite and spa.
- Two great living areas large enough for any growing family and a built-in bar for entertaining.
- A well laid out kitchen with a built-in pantry, wall oven, hot plates and dishwasher. All overlooking the second dining area.
- Oversized two car garage and a 7x7 shed at the rear of the property.
This home also has ducted heating, evaporative cooling & a wood fire. This is an ideal investment or the perfect property for your first family home. Please book your inspection today to avoid disappointment.

Are you looking to break into the property market for the first time? Looking for an ideal investment? Looking to downsize? This beautifully presented property is the property for you and it's all located close to schools, parks, public transport, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, has easy access to Fountain Gate shopping centre and the Monash freeway. This amazing property proudly boasting:
- 3 robed bedrooms (Master with Full Ensuite)
- Great Sized Open Living area
- Ducted heating and Ducted Cooling
- Landscaped Gardens with Shed
- Double garage
- Large pergola - great for entertainment!
- Plus much more...
All this value makes it the perfect home, ready for you to move in and enjoy. Or the perfect inclusion into any investors property portfolio. The quiet position makes this the perfect place to call home. For more information on this outstanding property, Call Mr May.
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Description:
Gorgeous Family Home - Close To Everything!
Peacefully nestled on a corner block this gorgeous fully renovated 3 bedroom family home will appeal to families, investors and downsizers alike with nothing to do other than move in and enjoy.
Comprising of 3 generous bedrooms, all with build in robes and serviced by a modern family bathroom. A Modern kitchen/dining and generous sized lounge room filled with plenty of natural light with crackling open fireplace is the perfect spot to relax whilst outside you are greeted by a lovely rear courtyard and timber deck, perfect for entertaining and the kids and pets to run and play.
Added extras include split system cooling and wood fire Conara for year round comfort, polished floorboards throughout, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, 900mm freestanding oven and cooktop, laundry, 12 solar panels with 3Kw converter, garden shed and generous double carport.
Located within walking distance to all facilities including the newly renovated Cranbourne Centro, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.

Description:
Cranbourne CBD Development Opportunity on 809M2!
Attention all developers, investors or those first home buyers looking to buy and secure an amazing future opportunity. Often sought, yet rarely found this central Cranbourne location offers potential to subdivide (Subject to Council Approval)!
This beautiful brick home offers polished floorboards throughout, three bedrooms all complete with built in robes, and are serviced by the central bathroom which includes a shower, toilet and single vanity. Spacious living/dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with large bench top and appliances including cook top and oven, plus plenty of cupboard and bench space, which adjoins the functional meals area. This property also offers an additional separate toilet and laundry which offers external access to the backyard.
Outside you'll have plenty of room to move with its huge private grassed backyard and a good size shed for extra storage.
Set on a massive 809SQM block this home is nestled in the heart of Cranbourne Central and within close proximity to the following amenities including:
- 600m walk to the station
- 100m walk to South Gippsland Highway
- 1.4km walk to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre
- 1km walk to the Hunt Club Shopping Village
- 45 Mins Drive to Melbourne CBD
Be quick as this property will not Last!

This is the property for you and it's all located close to quality schools, parks, public transport, Springhill Shopping Centre, Thompsons Parkway Shopping Centre, has easy access to the Monash freeway and all other amenities. This amazing property proudly boasting:
- Three good sized robed bedrooms
- Two large living zones
- Spacious kitchen with plenty of bench space
- Open meals and family area
- Approx: 561m2 block of land

- Plus much more...
All this value makes it the perfect home, ready for you to move in and enjoy. The quiet position makes this the perfect place to call home. For more information on this outstanding property, Call Mr May.
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our department head of rentals Melanie Keating has appraised this property at $370-$380 p/w ($1,607 - $1,651 pcm) for more details about leasing contact Melanie on 03 9705 3000 today.
Our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with absolute confidence that the genuine vendors will sell within the range with fair terms and conditions.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
Blooming brilliant
The word POTENTIAL first comes to mind when you step into this ripe beauty. Featuring four generous bedrooms on a HUGE 677m2 block, this home offers a rare combination of generous living space, beautiful established gardens and the perfect court location. A great opportunity to secure your next home whether that be an investment, first home or downsizing
Features include:
- Four Bedrooms all of great size with built in robes to all
- Master bedroom includes its own ensuite and walk in robe
- Kitchen overlooking the outdoor area includes a walk in pantry, gas cooktop, plenty of cupboard space and breakfast bar
- Large separate living area with fireplace creates character to the home
- Separate toilet and family bathroom
- Outside features an undercover alfresco area, a garden shed for storage, a generous backyard for kids and pets to play plus beautiful established gardens and fruit trees
- Double lock up garage with plenty of parking space behind a remote gate offers the opportunity to securely park a caravan, trailer or boat and your cars
- Other features include – ducted heating throughout the home, A/C unit in the main lounge, a garden water tank and secure parking
This well-loved property is all within walking distance to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, St. Agatha's Primary School and Cranbourne Racecourse. There is also a children's park just around the corner as well as the 791 Bus Stop 350m away. With a little bit of love you can reap the rewards, this is one not to overlook!

Description:
FAMILY LIVING IN BROOKLAND GREENS
CRANBOURNE: Brookland Greens is known for its quality homes as well as the convenience of location. Westernport Highway, South Gippsland Highway and Cranbourne-Frankston Road are all easily accessed from the estate which brings you within minutes of central Cranbourne, medical centres, public transport, schools, sports centres and swimming pools.
Measuring approximately 28 squares in total (includes garage, sunroom and porch) set on a block size of approximately 593 sqm is this home which has everything to offer. All you would need to do is move in, unpack and enjoy all the benefits this home has included.
On plan is three good sized bedrooms plus a study, master with full en suite while the other two bedrooms are serviced by a centrally located toilet and bathroom.
The well-equipped kitchen which is positioned overlooking the huge tiled open plan dining and living area comes with plenty of storage and bench space, built in panty, 600mm stainless steel wall oven and gas cook top plus a dishwasher.
For the entertainer in you, this home has an enclosed sunroom with a beautiful ferny feature along with built in cupboards which offers additional bench space. With low maintenance front and back yard youll be able to find more time to spend with your family and friends.
Added internal and external features include:
* Approximately 28 sq in total (includes garage, sunroom & porch)
* Approximately 593 sqm land
* Three bedrooms plus study
* Open plan kitchen, dining and living area
* Built in pantry
* 600 mm stainless steel wall oven and gas cooktop
* Dishwasher
* Master with full en suite
* Master with walk in robe
* Ducted heating
* Split system units in living area & master bedroom
* Polished floor boards
* Sun room with ferny feature piece
* Double garage
* Solar hot water
* Low maintenance gardens
* Cherryhills Drive Reserve is approximately five minutes walk away from the house
* Barton Primary School is approximately six minutes drive away from the house
* Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre is approximately five minutes drive away from the house
* Amstel Golf Club is approximately five minutes drive away from the house
* St Peters College is approximately four minutes drive away from the house
* Cranbourne Swimming pool is approximately five minutes drive away from the house
* Easy access to the Cranbourne-Frankston Rd and South Gippsland Hwy
*PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
STUNNING HOME IN A GREAT LOCATION!!!!!!!! UNDER OFFER
Cranbourne: Set on a decent block size of approximately 444 square metres is this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to secure a great home with the perfect floor plan for a growing family in one of the most sought after locations in Cranbourne. Close to all amenities yet a distance away from the hustle and bustle of this ever-growing area.
As you walk through the main door of this home you are greeted by a rather long walk-way. To the immediate right is located the master bedroom with a full stylish ensuite and a large walk-in robe. The bedroom itself is spacious and will accommodate a large bed and still have sufficient room. The other two spacious bedrooms are perfectly located within this floor plan and are well serviced by the perfectly appointed second shower and toilet. Both bedrooms come with built-in robes offering plenty of storage.
As you progress past the bedrooms you are then led into the nucleus of this home, the open plan kitchen, living and dining area. If you enjoy cooking and baking then the kitchen is a chefs delight, with quality stainless steel appliances, plenty of storage/pantry space. The dining/living area is perfectly designed to bring the whole family together at the end of a long and tiring day where they can sit around and enjoy a great meal or just relax watching a nice movie.
Families with little children will have peace of mind with the fact that the backyard is fully fenced and secure with mature plants and a low maintenance garden. Also provided with this home is a side-access for those with a boat or a trailer. The home is situated along-side picturesque parklands for all-year quiet and serenity and about 100 meters away is a council provided play area for the kids.
If you believe your family deserves only the very best in family/community living then please do not delay and book an inspection as soon as possible before it SELLS!!! SELLS!!! ..SOLD!!!!!.
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW. (PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS)
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that the vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
Added internal and external features include:
- Approximately 444 sqms of land
- Master with full ensuite
- Single lock up garage
- Open Plan Dining and Living
- Stainless steel appliances
- Ceiling Fans x 2 with remotes
- Air Conditioner
- Ducted Heating
- 600mm cook top
- 600mm oven
- Dishwasher
- New carpets
- Low maintenance gardens
- Secure backyard
• Cranbourne Railway Station is approximately seven minutes drive from home.
• Merinda Park Railway Station is approximately seven minutes drive from home.
• Springhill Shopping Centre is approximately five minutes drive from home.
• Thompsons Parkway Shopping Centre is approximately six minutes drive from home.
• Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre is approximately ten minutes drive from home.
• Casey Central Shopping Centre is approximately eight minutes drive from home.
• Cranbourne Carlisle Primary School is approximately five minutes drive from home.
• Cranbourne Secondary College is approximately 10 minutes drive from home.

Description:
Presentation, Position and Practicality!
First home buyers, downsizers and investors will delight in this well-presented property offering a refreshed and light filled space ready to call home.
Set in a prime location, you will find yourself within walking distance to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Park Primary School, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station as well as having easy access to the South Gippsland Highway.
Nestled at the rear of the block, this smart two bedroom home offers both privacy and practical living. Maintained to an immaculate standard, youâ??ll be impressed from the moment you step inside. The layout begins with a large living room and separate meals and kitchen area, all of which enjoy large north facing windows. Both bedrooms have built in robes and access to an updated central bathroom and separate toilet. Other features of the home include a wall heater, air conditioner and stylish timber laminate flooring.
The home is complimented with a private rear courtyard and a single car garage. Call us today to learn more about this fantastic investment.

Description:
Bellissimo - Outstanding craftsmanship!
You could be forgiven for thinking you are walking through a Villa in Florence when entering this exquisite property. Built and renovated using the finest stone, timber and imported materials; the residence combines beautiful quality Italian craftsmanship, a practical floor plan, an emphasis on entertaining & landscaped gardens - to create this wonderful, unique property. Boasting 3 bedrooms (main with WIR and ensuite), 2 separate living areas ,a kitchen which boasts granite bench tops, quality appliances, pantry, the attic space is a rare treat in this property and undercover alfresco entertaining areas.
Other features include: ducted heating, cozy fireplace in the family room for those romantic evenings, 2 car garage with remote, garden shed , plus lots more.
The property is located within a short drive multiple to shopping centers, close to schools, bus stop, medical centre and easy access to freeways.
Call now for an appointment to inspect this amazing property!
